mapper.select: select * from shopping_datasource.shopping_cart_detail where product_id = #{productId} and customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.update: update shopping_datasource.shopping_cart_detail set quantity = quantity + #{quantity}, item_total_price = shopping_cart_detail.item_total_price + #{itemTotalPrice}, update_time = now() where detail_id = #{detailId}
mapper.delete: delete from shopping_datasource.shopping_cart_detail where product_id = #{productId} and customer_id = #{customerId}
